import { FunctionComponent, useState } from "react"; import { Document, Page } from "react-pdf"; import pdfViewer from "./pdfViewer"; import { Button, Modal } from "@restart/ui"; const PreviewPage: FunctionComponent = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); return (
{`HTML & CSS Preview`}
{pdfViewer()}
); }; export default PreviewPage;
